data.title: Kirarin revolution
data.meta_description: HI!!! im a big fan of Kirarin revoltion! =] and the subbing has come to a halt ... so the group who does the subbing is looking for subbers.
data.text:
HI!!! im a big fan of Kirarin revoltion! =] and the subbing has come to a halt ... so the group who does the subbing is looking for subbers. please spread the word that they are looking for subbers! the series is great so far and i would like to see it to the end.. if you or any one can sub and have time please help ^_^v heres the site you can also find subbed episodes to watch and download...im not giving up till we find a translator ^_^v because this show is awesome!!! http://kirarin.horvathd.co.cc/

0
